name: Orb Intelligence
desc: Firmographic database of over 45MM companies globally, ranging from single employee to large enterprises (incl. private companies). Data includes name, address, corporate hierarchy, revenue, headcount, industry classifications, web / email domains, list of branches / offices, technologies used.
main_data_source: Geo-location, Infrastructure/Interface, Public Data, Web Data
top_tickers: AAPL, ADSK, DBX, GOOGL, HPQ, MSFT, ORCL, PFE, TGT, WMT
full_ticker_coverage: All public tickers are covered for the core firmographics and corporate hierarchies.
full_sector_coverage: All sectors are included. Global database of over 45MM companies. 22MM in North America, 11MM in EMEA, 8MM in APAC and 4MM in LATAM
data_delivery: Raw, Platform Based, Custom Analysis, API
pricing_structure: Pricing is based on the number of records accessed per month typically ranges from $5k to $20k per month
why_us?: Most complete set of corporate hierarchies, industry classifications & websites
advantages: Global coverage of companies (especially private companies), and price point
use_cases: Determine corporate hierarchy of company, determine core firmographic data (e.g. revenue, industry classification), and using website to conduct advanced analytics
